data.title: US Stocks Likely To Open Lower As Trump's Trade War Continues To Impact The Market: 'Volatility Is The Toll We Pay To Invest,' Says Expert
data.description: U.S. stock futures were trading lower on Tuesday after Monday's decline as the new administration tariffs continued to spook the market.

data.title: Paramount Resumes Partnership With Nielsen For Data Services: Details
data.description: Paramount Global has entered a new long-term deal with Nielsen, enhancing audience insights across all platforms, including Paramount+ and Pluto TV.

data.title: Windows 11 Disaster? Microsoft Quietly Removes Workaround For Unsupported PCs, Potentially Leaving Millions Unable To Upgrade
data.description: Microsoft has removed a previously available workaround that allowed users to bypass Windows 11's strict hardware requirements, leaving millions unable to upgrade.
